> [{quoted}](name=xZabaksx,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t2V4ZyXo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-19T17:38:09.517+0000)

my man Pyke, best new champ in a long while

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=t2V4ZyXo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-11-19T17:39:02.658+0000)
>
> my man Pyke, best new champ in a long while

Pyke is also lowkey OP with his ungodly amount of self sustain. He needs his healing and/or gray health capped with a decay.

Can we not bring gameplay issues into M&G?

Thanks
Low elo players analyzing gameplay issues **IS** a meme though.
God forbid people under master tier to know what they enjoy or what they don't and discuss it (99% of the playerbase btw)

More like God forbid people who either aren't even decent at the game or _don't play the game enough_ say what a champ does and doesn't need changed to be balanced.

Edit: Let me make my point clear just in case you actually come back to reply to this. It's fine to express disdain but when you think you know what a champ needs and you don't even know what counterplay there is to the champ and its mechanics, then that's just silly.
tl;dr The 99% of the playerbase states opinions of champions and how strong they are as facts and think their facts are solutions to gameplay issues.

See, that's the mentality that makes such arguments hard to agree with, people have gotten used to thinking that the enjoyability of the game depends entirely on your skill level, not with the gameplay itself, and when there are champions in the game created by CertainlyT which are known to be pain in the asses to deal with unless you're on the top 5% of the playerbase then there's an obvious problem with the champion's gameplay. The fact that you believe that if you don't spend 5 hours a day playing this game to get better pretending to be a pro you can't have fun actually baffles me.

You don't have to be a god at the game to be able to tell something is annoying to play against or be unsatisfied about aspects of the game. Sure, the opposite can also be said about people that have a couple of months of experience, those clearly don't know the basics of the game and they would be the only kind of people i would agree they have no idea what they're talking about.

People need to realize that this is a GAME and a lot of people don't even care about ranked at all or not enough to spend hours a day grinding something meaningless to your average joe such as divisions. This is NOT some sort of elite society in which your opinion only matters if you're high elo.
why are you being downvoted lol

Yep, definitely going on R34 there....
NEEKOMON!
NEEKO NEEKO NEEEEE
Glad someone else thought of that when they saw the name.

Similarities:
-Launched in preseason
-Girl mage champion
-Both think Ezreal is cute.
-Both have a lock down spell on E 
-Both have a damage spell on Q
-Both have dashes

Neeko is way more Cute. : Prove me wrong.
Considering she can change her appearance to anyone else's. I can't prove you wrong

well considering for a moment that niko does not have any mobility whatsoever that is immediately false on the dashes part. i wouldnt call niko's e "reliable lockdown" as it has to go through multiple enemies to be consistent. currently dont know much about her so that whole ezreal talk is bs. and then theyre both mages so why tf wouldnt they have similarities in that they have a damaging spell on q? like literally every champion in the game. also yes neeko is more cute
Well on the Ez thing a rioter flat out said Neeko is lesbian
did not see that. would further prove my point LOL
to be specific, Neeko's comment is that he's "pretty, for a boy.... too pretty" with a tone of almost, confusion.
She says he's cute for a boy in her interactions. She doesn't think he's cute in the way zoe does, but she did say it so I get where magmaender got that similarity
I think they're both cute.
I was thinking {{champion:142}}  + {{champion:7}}  and oh my god it sounds and looks cancerous
and yet i can actually stand Neekos character without hard cringing or wanting to smash my brains out. trust me, she is NOT on Zoe's level of dogshit design.
What you don't like getting 95% of your hp nuked by Zoe's one Q from a mile away? :P
